com.twilio.chat

Interface ChatClientListener


  • public interface ChatClientListener
    This interface defines ChatClient callback methods.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void onAddedToChannelNotification(java.lang.String channelSid)
      Called when client receives a push notification for added to channel event.
      void onChannelAdded(Channel channel)
      Called when the current user has a channel added to their channel list, channel status is not specified.
      void onChannelDeleted(Channel channel)
      Called when one of the channel of the current user is deleted.
      void onChannelInvited(Channel channel)
      Called when the current user was invited to a channel, channel status @link Channel#ChannelStatus#INVITED "invited" @endlink.
      void onChannelJoined(Channel channel)
      Called when the current user either joined or was added into a channel, channel status @link Channel#ChannelStatus#JOINED "joined" @endlink.
      void onChannelSynchronizationChange(Channel channel)
      Called when channel synchronization status changed.
      void onChannelUpdated(Channel channel, Channel.UpdateReason reason)
      Called when the channel is updated.
      void onClientSynchronization(ChatClient.SynchronizationStatus status)
      Called when client synchronization status changes
      void onConnectionStateChange(ChatClient.ConnectionState state)
      Called when client connnection state has changed.
      void onError(ErrorInfo errorInfo)
      Called when an error condition occurs.
      void onInvitedToChannelNotification(java.lang.String channelSid)
      Called when client receives a push notification for invited to channel event.
      void onNewMessageNotification(java.lang.String channelSid, java.lang.String messageSid, long messageIndex)
      Called when client receives a push notification for new message.
      void onNotificationFailed(ErrorInfo errorInfo)
      Called when registering for push notifications fails.
      void onNotificationSubscribed()
      Called when you are successfully registered for push notifications.
      void onRemovedFromChannelNotification(java.lang.String channelSid)
      Called when client receives a push notification for removed from channel event.
      void onTokenAboutToExpire()
      Called when token is about to expire soon.
      void onTokenExpired()
      Called when token has expired.
      void onUserSubscribed(User user)
      Called when a user is subscribed to and will receive realtime state updates.
      void onUserUnsubscribed(User user)
      Called when a user is unsubscribed from and will not receive realtime state updates anymore.
      void onUserUpdated(User user, User.UpdateReason reason)
      Called when user info is updated for currently loaded users

    • Method Detail

      • onChannelJoined

        void onChannelJoined(Channel channel)
        Called when the current user either joined or was added into a channel, channel status @link Channel#ChannelStatus#JOINED "joined" @endlink.
        Parameters:
        channel - The channel that the user has joined or was added into.

      • onChannelInvited

        void onChannelInvited(Channel channel)
        Called when the current user was invited to a channel, channel status @link Channel#ChannelStatus#INVITED "invited" @endlink.
        Parameters:
        channel - The channel that the user is invited to.

      • onChannelAdded

        void onChannelAdded(Channel channel)
        Called when the current user has a channel added to their channel list, channel status is not specified.
        Parameters:
        channel - The channel that was added.

      • onChannelUpdated

        void onChannelUpdated(Channel channel,
                      Channel.UpdateReason reason)
        Called when the channel is updated. Channel synchronization updates are delivered via different callback.
        Parameters:
        channel - The channel that updated.
        reason - Which information in the channel has updated.

      • onChannelDeleted

        void onChannelDeleted(Channel channel)
        Called when one of the channel of the current user is deleted.
        Parameters:
        channel - The channel that got deleted.

      • onChannelSynchronizationChange

        void onChannelSynchronizationChange(Channel channel)
        Called when channel synchronization status changed. Use Channel.getSynchronizationStatus() to obtain new channel status.
        Parameters:
        channel - Channel whose synchronization status has changed.

      • onError

        void onError(ErrorInfo errorInfo)
        Called when an error condition occurs.
        Parameters:
        errorInfo - ErrorInfo object containing error info

      • onUserUpdated

        void onUserUpdated(User user,
                   User.UpdateReason reason)
        Called when user info is updated for currently loaded users
        Parameters:
        user - User info object.
        reason - Reason for update.

      • onUserSubscribed

        void onUserSubscribed(User user)
        Called when a user is subscribed to and will receive realtime state updates.
        Parameters:
        user - User that has been subscribed.

      • onUserUnsubscribed

        void onUserUnsubscribed(User user)
        Called when a user is unsubscribed from and will not receive realtime state updates anymore.
        Parameters:
        user - User that has been unsubscribed.

      • onClientSynchronization

        void onClientSynchronization(ChatClient.SynchronizationStatus status)
        Called when client synchronization status changes
        Parameters:
        status - New client synchronization status.

      • onNewMessageNotification

        void onNewMessageNotification(java.lang.String channelSid,
                              java.lang.String messageSid,
                              long messageIndex)
        Called when client receives a push notification for new message.
        Parameters:
        channelSid - Sid of the related channel.
        messageSid - Sid of the related message.
        messageIndex - Index of the related message.
        Since:
        3.0.0

      • onAddedToChannelNotification

        void onAddedToChannelNotification(java.lang.String channelSid)
        Called when client receives a push notification for added to channel event.
        Parameters:
        channelSid - Sid of the related channel.
        Since:
        3.0.0

      • onInvitedToChannelNotification

        void onInvitedToChannelNotification(java.lang.String channelSid)
        Called when client receives a push notification for invited to channel event.
        Parameters:
        channelSid - Sid of the related channel.
        Since:
        3.0.0

      • onRemovedFromChannelNotification

        void onRemovedFromChannelNotification(java.lang.String channelSid)
        Called when client receives a push notification for removed from channel event.
        Parameters:
        channelSid - Sid of the related channel.
        Since:
        3.0.0

      • onNotificationSubscribed

        void onNotificationSubscribed()
        Called when you are successfully registered for push notifications.

      • onNotificationFailed

        void onNotificationFailed(ErrorInfo errorInfo)
        Called when registering for push notifications fails.
        Parameters:
        errorInfo - An error indicating the failure.

      • onConnectionStateChange

        void onConnectionStateChange(ChatClient.ConnectionState state)
        Called when client connnection state has changed.
        Parameters:
        state - New connection state.

      • onTokenExpired

        void onTokenExpired()
        Called when token has expired. In response, ChatClient should generate a new token and call updateToken() as soon as possible.

      • onTokenAboutToExpire

        void onTokenAboutToExpire()
        Called when token is about to expire soon. In response, ChatClient should generate a new token and call updateToken() as soon as possible.
